title: Rice flour

preparations.content: Place rice into mixingÂ bowl and mill <b>2 min/speed 10<b>. Use as needed.

hintsAndTricks: Rice flour can be stored for long periods of time in an airtight jar or container.
Use brown rice for higher nutritional value.
Other grains and legumes can be milled into flour using the same method. Milling times will vary depending on the grain used.
